hw3
Class Event

java.lang.Object
  hw3.Event

public class Event
extends java.lang.Object

An event which after occurring on a given year, month, and day, is continually observed in subsequent years on the same month and day.

Constructor Summary
Event(int year, int month, int day, java.lang.String description)
          Create an event which first occurred on the specified year, month, and day.

Event

public Event(int year,
             int month,

             java.lang.String description)
Create an event which first occurred on the specified year, month, and day.

Parameters:
year - Year of first occurrence.
month - Month of first occurrence.
day - Day of first occurrence.
description - Textual description of the event. May contain ### fields.
Method Detail

getDescription

public java.lang.String getDescription(int year)
Get the description of the event with a slight twist. The first occurrence of ### in the description is replaced by a numeric descriptor indicating how many times the event has occurred at the time the event is observed in the specified year. If the specified year is equivalent to the event's starting year, 0th is substituted. If the specified year is one year after the event's starting year, 1st is substituted. And so on. If no ### exists, then the description is returned as is.

Parameters:
year - The year in which the event is to be observed. It is assumed that the year will not be less than the event's start date. (If the year does occur before the event, the ### will be replaced by a negative ordinal value.)
Returns:
A description of the event, with an indication of how many times it has been observed.

isObservedOn

public boolean isObservedOn(int year,
                            int month,
                            int day)
Determine if the event is observed on the specified date. An event is observed only if it occurs on the specified month and day, but not if it has not happened by the specified year. That is, if an event first occurs in 1996 and the specified year is 1995, the event does not occur, no matter the month and day.

Parameters:
year - Year of occurrence.
month - Month of occurrence.
day - Day of occurrence.
Returns:
True if the event is observed on this date.
